events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer’s issue has been identified as a refund request due to receiving the incorrect product.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah T. who specializes in refund processing.
Hello, I’m Sarah and I will assist you today with your refund request for the incorrect item you received.
Could you please provide your order number and a picture of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Here is my order number 987654321 and the attached photo shows the item I actually received, which is different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. I have approved a full refund for your purchase and you should see the amount back in your account within 5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and the refund approval. I appreciate your help in resolving this so fast.
The refund process has been completed successfully and the case will be closed shortly.
We just wanted to check in and confirm that you received your refund without any issues. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Your case is now officially closed. Thank you for contacting us, and we hope to serve you better in the future.
